price: 38. Ma wuxuu qof walba oo ka mid ahi damci in la geliyo Jannada barwaaqada ah?
arabic: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ayaṭmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿīmin
